resource.http://dev.llgc.org.uk/sas/full_text: An untidy and smoky workspace. Some sort of catastrophe seems to have just happened or to be on the verge of happening.
resource.chars: An untidy and smoky workspace. Some sort of catastrophe seems to have just happened or to be on the verge of happening.

resource.http://dev.llgc.org.uk/sas/full_text: This worker is wearing a jester's cap, illustrating Bruegel's view ofalchemical work as lacking seriousness.
resource.chars:
This worker is wearing a jester's cap, illustrating Bruegel's view of
alchemical work as lacking seriousness.

resource.http://dev.llgc.org.uk/sas/full_text: Children playing. One of them is blinded by the pot on his head, similar to the worker with his cap. A parallel is drawn between the chaos of the workshop and that of children's games.
resource.chars: Children playing. One of them is blinded by the pot on his head, similar to the worker with his cap. A parallel is drawn between the chaos of the workshop and that of children's games.

resource.http://dev.llgc.org.uk/sas/full_text: An alchemist attempts, but fails, to organize the activities of the laboratory. Despite his instructions, the workshop is in a state of chaos.
resource.chars: An alchemist attempts, but fails, to organize the activities of the laboratory. Despite his instructions, the workshop is in a state of chaos.

resource.http://dev.llgc.org.uk/sas/full_text: The bag held by the woman is empty: there is no more food in the house. According to Bruegel, alchemy is not a profitable activity, the pursuit of which leads to anarchy and poverty.
resource.chars: The bag held by the woman is empty: there is no more food in the house. According to Bruegel, alchemy is not a profitable activity, the pursuit of which leads to anarchy and poverty.

resource.http://dev.llgc.org.uk/sas/full_text: The consequences of the scholar’s devotion to alchemy : the family joins the hospice for the poor.
resource.chars: The consequences of the scholar’s devotion to alchemy : the family joins the hospice for the poor.

resource.http://dev.llgc.org.uk/sas/full_text: Folio volumes, symbols of the futility of bookish knowledge : despite the scholar's extended knowledge, the workshop's activities are disorderly and absurd.
resource.chars: Folio volumes, symbols of the futility of bookish knowledge : despite the scholar's extended knowledge, the workshop's activities are disorderly and absurd.
